org.sindice.rdfcommons
Interface TripleSet

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Triple>
All Known Implementing Classes:
TripleBuffer
public interface TripleSet
extends java.lang.Iterable<Triple>

Defines a triple container.

Version:
$Id: TripleSet.java 2 2010-11-20 17:45:05Z michele.mostarda $
Author:
Michele Mostarda ( mostarda@fbk.eu )

addTriple

void addTriple(java.lang.String sub,
               boolean bsub,
               java.lang.String pred,
               java.lang.Object obj,
               boolean literal,
               boolean bobj)
Adds a blank subject triple with explicit value.

Parameters:
sub - the subject URI or identifier.
bsub - if true the subject is a blank node.
pred - the predicate string URI.
obj - the object URI or literal.
literal - if true the object is a literal.
bobj - if true the object is a blank node.
